title: Ritualist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attempt to sacrifice someone at night. If they didn't visit and they weren't visited by any other players, they'll be forced to commit suicide and the Town will be informed that it was an unnatural suicide. Your target visiting themself doesn't count for either, nor do Astral or indirect abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a layer of Basic defense that can prevent one attack.
- Your defense increases by a level for each player you sacrifice.
